trans-unit.source: Defines a set of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> fields that each corresponds to a command function provided by the workflow designers.
trans-unit.target: 定義一組 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> 欄位，每一個欄位都對應至工作流程設計工具提供的一個命令函式。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> contains a set of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> fields that can be used to specify a command to link when adding a command using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> 包含一組 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID> 欄位，使用 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.AddCommand%2A> 的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> 方法加入命令時，可以使用這些欄位指定要連結的命令。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text.
trans-unit.target: 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。

trans-unit.source: To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> 屬性的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> 方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text.
trans-unit.target: 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。

trans-unit.source: To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> 屬性的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> 方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for the breakpoint action menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得中斷點動作功能表的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The breakpoint action menu is typically used to set, remove, or change breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 中斷點動作功能表通常用來設定、移除或變更中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for the breakpoint condition menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得中斷點條件功能表的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The breakpoint condition menu is typically used to set, remove, or change conditional breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 中斷點條件功能表通常用來設定、移除或變更條件中斷點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for the breakpoint constraints menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得中斷點條件約束功能表的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The breakpoint constraints menu is typically used to set, remove or change constraints on breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 中斷點條件約束功能表通常用來設定、移除或變更中斷點上的條件約束。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for the breakpoint hit count menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得中斷點叫用次數 (Hit Count) 功能表的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The breakpoint hit count menu typically displays the hit count for breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 中斷點叫用次數功能表通常用來顯示中斷點的叫用次數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for the breakpoint location menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得中斷點位置功能表的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The breakpoint location menu is typically used to modify the location of breakpoints.
trans-unit.target: 中斷點位置功能表通常用來修改中斷點的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> for the change theme menu.
trans-unit.target: 取得變更主題功能表的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The theme change menu is typically used to change the theme for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 主題變更功能表通常用來變更設計工具的主題。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the clear breakpoints menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取清除中斷點功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The clear breakpoints menu is typically used to clear all breakpoints set in the debugger.
trans-unit.target: 清除中斷點功能表通常用來清除偵錯工具中的所有中斷點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the collapse menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取摺疊功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The collapse menu is typically used to collapse composite activities.
trans-unit.target: 摺疊功能表通常用於摺疊複合活動。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text.
trans-unit.target: 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。

trans-unit.source: To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> 屬性的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> 方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the copy menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取複製功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the create theme menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取建立主題功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The create theme menu is typically used to create a new theme for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 建立主題功能表通常用來建立設計工具的新主題。

trans-unit.source: Provides a unique identifier for the debug command set.
trans-unit.target: 提供偵錯命令集的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the debug step branch menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取偵錯步驟的分支功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The debug step branch menu is typically used to step into a branch in the debugger.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯步驟分支功能表通常用來逐步執行偵錯工具中的分支。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the debug step instance menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取偵錯步驟執行個體功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The debug step instance menu is typically used to step into an instance of an object in the debugger.
trans-unit.target: 偵錯步驟執行個體功能表通常用來逐步執行偵錯工具中物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Provides a unique identifier for the debug workflow group of menus.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能表的偵錯工作流程群組的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the default filter menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取預設篩選條件功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The default filter menu is typically used to set or modify the default filter for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 預設篩選條件功能表通常用來設定或修改工作流程的預設篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the default page menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取預設頁面功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The default page menu is typically used to set or modify the default page for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 預設頁面功能表通常用來設定或修改工作流程的預設頁面。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the designer actions menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取設計工具動作功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The designer actions menu is typically used to access actions available to the designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具動作功能表通常用來存取設計工具可用的動作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the designer properties menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取設計工具屬性功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The designer properties menu typically provides a dialog to set designer properties.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具屬性功能表通常提供了可設定設計工具屬性的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the disable menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取停用功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The disable menu typically disables an activity on a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 停用功能表通常可停用工作流程中的活動。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text.
trans-unit.target: 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。

trans-unit.source: To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> 屬性的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> 方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the enable menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取啟用功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The enable menu typically enables an activity on a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 啟用功能表通常可啟用工作流程中的活動。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text.
trans-unit.target: 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。

trans-unit.source: To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> 屬性的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> 方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the enable breakpoint menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取啟用中斷點功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The enable breakpoint menu typically enables a previously set breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 啟用中斷點功能表通常可啟用先前設定的中斷點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the execution state menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取執行狀態功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The execution state menu typically indicates the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 執行狀態功能表通常用來表示工作流程的狀態。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the expand menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取展開功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The expand menu typically causes collapsed sections of code to expand.
trans-unit.target: 展開功能表通常可將摺疊的程式碼區段展開。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text.

trans-unit.target: 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。

trans-unit.source: To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class as shown in the following example.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the zoom first menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取縮放為第一級的功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The zoom first command typically restores the workflow view to the first zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 縮放為第一級命令通常可將工作流程檢視還原至第一級的縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the goto disassembly menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取 goto 反組譯碼功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The goto disassembly menu is typically used to navigate to disassembled code in the debugger.
trans-unit.target: goto 反組譯碼功能表通常可用來巡覽至設計工具中的反組譯程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the insert breakpoint menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取插入中斷點功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The insert breakpoint menu is typically used to insert a breakpoint into the workflow at the cursor or before the current selection.
trans-unit.target: 插入中斷點功能表通常用來將中斷點插入工作流程的游標處，或插入至目前選取範圍之前。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the insert tracepoint menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取插入追蹤點功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The insert tracepoint menu is typically used to insert a tracepoint at the cursor or before the current selection.
trans-unit.target: 插入追蹤點功能表通常用來將追蹤點插入游標處，或插入至目前選取範圍之前。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the zoom last menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取縮放為最後一級的功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The last zoom command typically restores the workflow view to the last zoom level.
trans-unit.target: 縮放為最後一級命令通常可將工作流程檢視還原至最後一級的縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: Provides a unique identifier for the menu.
trans-unit.target: 提供功能表的唯一識別碼。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the new data breakpoint menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取新資料中斷點功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The new data breakpoint menu typically inserts a new data-driven breakpoint.
trans-unit.target: 新資料中斷點功能表通常用來插入新資料驅動的中斷點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the new file tracepoint menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取新檔案追蹤點功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The new file tracepoint menu typically inserts a new tracepoint.
trans-unit.target: 新檔案追蹤點功能表通常可插入新的追蹤點。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the PageDown menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取 PageDown 功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The page down menu is typically used to scroll the workflow down one page.
trans-unit.target: 下一頁功能表通常用來將工作流程捲動至下一頁。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the page layout menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取頁面配置功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The page layout menu is typically used to adjust the page layout options.
trans-unit.target: 頁面配置功能表通常用來調整頁面配置的選項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the page setup menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取版面設定功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The page setup menu is typically used to bring forward the page setup dialog.
trans-unit.target: 版面設定功能表通常用來帶出版面設定對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the PageUp menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取 PageUp 功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The page up menu is typically used to scroll the workflow up one page.
trans-unit.target: 上一頁功能表通常用來將工作流程捲動至上一頁。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the pan menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取捲動功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The pan menu is typically used to scroll the visible area of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 捲動功能表通常用來捲動工作流程的可見區域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the pan menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取捲動功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The pan menu is typically used to scroll the visible area of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 捲動功能表通常用來捲動工作流程的可見區域。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the print menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取列印功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The print menu is typically used to print the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 列印功能表通常用來列印工作流程。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the print preview menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取預覽列印功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The print preview menu is typically used to preview the printing of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 預覽列印功能表通常用來預覽工作流程的列印。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the print preview page menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取列印預覽頁面功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The print preview page menu is typically used to page through a print preview.
trans-unit.target: 列印預覽頁面功能表通常用來逐頁查看列印預覽。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the run to cursor menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用於存取執行至游標處功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The run to cursor menu is typically used to place a breakpoint in the workflow at the location of the cursor and resume execution until that breakpoint is reached.
trans-unit.target: 執行至游標處功能表通常用來將中斷點放置在工作流程中的游標處，並在到達該中斷點時繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the save as image menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取儲存為影像功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The save as image menu saves the workflow as an image.
trans-unit.target: 儲存為影像功能表可將工作流程儲存為影像。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the selection menu.
trans-unit.target: 可用於存取選取功能表的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The selection menu is typically used to manage a selection within the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 選取功能表通常用來管理工作流程中的選取。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何建立自訂 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService>。

trans-unit.source: In this example, a context menu is created when the `ShowContextMenu` is called.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，呼叫 `ShowContextMenu` 時，會建立一個內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the `GetSelectionMenuItems` method, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> class is utilized to associate the proper menu commands provided by the workflow designer with their corresponding text.
trans-unit.target: 在 `GetSelectionMenuItems` 方法中，會利用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowMenuCommands> 類別，使工作流程設計工具所提供的適當功能表命令與其對應文字產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: When this is finished, an event handler is associated with each command so that when the command is selected, the appropriate `MenuCommand` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 當完成這項作業時，事件處理常式會與每一個命令產生關聯，如此一來，當選取此命令時，就會叫用適當的 `MenuCommand`。

trans-unit.source: To enable this service, call the `AddService` method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> property in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class as shown in the following example.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用這個服務，請在 `AddService` 類別中呼叫 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.BasicDesignerLoader.LoaderHost%2A> 屬性的 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> 方法，如下列範例所示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the set next statement menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取設定下一個陳述式功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The set next statement menu is typically used to set the next statement to execute while stepping through the execution of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 設定下一個陳述式功能表通常用來在逐步執行工作流程時設定執行下一個陳述式。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The show all menu is typically used to show all child objects in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 全部顯示功能表通常用來顯示工作流程中所有的子物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the show next statement menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取顯示下一個陳述式功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The show next statement menu is typically used to highlight the next statement to be executed while stepping through the execution of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 顯示下一個陳述式功能表通常用來在逐步執行工作流程時反白顯示下一個要執行的陳述式。

trans-unit.target: 放大功能表通常用來增加工作流程的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the zoom level combo menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取縮放層級下拉式功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The zoom level combo menu is typically used to bring forward a dialog from which the user can select a zoom level from a combo box.
trans-unit.target: 縮放層級下拉式功能表通常用來帶出可讓使用者從下拉式方塊中選取縮放層級的對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the zoom level list handler menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取縮放層級清單處理常式功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The zoom level list handler typically provides a mechanism to switch between different view levels.
trans-unit.target: 縮放層級清單處理常式通常提供了可切換不同檢視層級的機制。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the zoom menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取縮放功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The zoom menu typically provides a choice of zoom levels for the workflow view.
trans-unit.target: 縮放功能表通常會提供工作流程檢視的縮放層級選擇。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" /> that can be used to access the zoom out menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID" />，可用來存取縮小功能表。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此欄位為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: The zoom out menu is typically used to decrease the magnification of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 縮小功能表通常用來減少工作流程的縮放比例。
